title: runtime: implement raiseproc everywhere
body:
Commit 5bfed7c6 ("runtime: log all thread stack traces during GODEBUG=crash on Linux and OS X") broke OpenBSD, etc.

http://build.golang.org/log/3c1aaccdeee7951ff4f5a670c98abe1967c127f9
```
...
go/build
cmd/go
runtime.sighandler: runtime.raiseproc: not defined
runtime.sighandler: undefined: runtime.raiseproc
go tool dist: FAILED: /tmp/buildlet-scatch781630640/pkg/tool/openbsd_amd64/6l -o /tmp/buildlet-scatch781630640/pkg/tool/openbsd_amd64/go_bootstrap $WORK/_go_.a
``
